resources.string: Go to list of all items
Created by James Boyer for MAP524, attending Seneca College
Simply browse through the list to find any item you want, click on that item to go to its item view.
Start typing a name of an item and if it is present in the database it will pop up, click on the item name to proceed to the item view.
Type in a specific volume/weight in the text box, click convert to see the corresponding average price for that weight.
View the history of prices for this item from previous months, you can add another item to the graph by typing a name of an item and clicking on it once it pops up.
